headline: Data Center REITs: Own The Real Estate Behind AI
summary: AI-driven demand is transforming data center REITs, with DLR and EQIX well-positioned despite recent volatility and short-term setbacks in 2025. Click to read.

headline: KKR Lifts Spectris Offer to $5.6 Billion Amid Bidding War With Advent
summary: The sweetened offer comes days after Advent improved its bid for Spectris, prompting the target to withdraw its recommendation for the previous offer put forward by KKR.

raw.headline: KKR Lifts Spectris Offer to $5.6 Billion Amid Bidding War With Advent
